author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
We catch up with propmaker and Fonco Studio Art Director Michael Corrie, who has long been obsessed wtih the Book of the Dead prop from The Mummy (1999). Michael shows Adam a working prototype of his replica of the prop, which he's making for Factory Entertainment to be turned into a officially licensed product. We learn how Michael has designed the book to lock and unlock with his replica of the Key of Hamunaptra!

Learn more about this prop at Factory Entertainment: https://www.facebook.com/factoryent 
Follow Michael's projects at https://www.michaelcorrie.com/ and https://foncostudios.com/

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: The Mummy's Book of the Dead as a Functional Prop!
